text: Ara tomadera naridera madhye yara byabhicarini tadera birud'dhe tomadera madhya theke cara jana purusake saksi hisebe talaba kara. Atahpara yadi tara saksya pradana kare tabe sanslistaderake grhe abad'dha rakha, ye paryanta mrtyu taderake tule na neya athaba allaha tadera jan'ya an'ya kona patha nirdesa na karena.
